title: iPad Air
description:
iPad Air brings more of our most powerful technologies to more people than ever. The A12 Bionic chip with Neural Engine.
A 10.5‑inch Retina display with True Tone. Support for Apple Pencil and the Smart Keyboard.

iPad Air is thin and light and features the A12 Bionic chip with Neural Engine, 10.5-inch Retina display, and Apple Pencil and Smart Keyboard support.
